CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 14, 1959, page A2, reads: "Non-Trower Pickets - Since last Friday morning, the Trower's Cleaners, In the Hill District and Homewood, have been picketed by members of the local 141 of the AFL-CIO Laundry and Dry Cleaning Workers International Union, who are not employes of Trower Cleaners, but members of the union. The local charges that Trower is unfair to union organizing activity in the Trower plants. Pickets above are marching outside the 2718 Wylie Ave. shop. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Woman and man, union employees, wearing sandwich boards reading "Unfair AFL - CIO, Laundry and Dry Cleaning, union local 141" protesting in front of Trower's Cleaners, 2718 Wylie Avenue, Hill District
